mapper.select: SELECT MACHINE_SEQ, CONCAT('SB-', LPAD(MACHINE_SEQ, 4, '0')) AS MACHINE_CODE, FN_CODE_NAME(MGMT_DEPT, 'MD') MGMT_DEPT, MGMT_NO, CONCAT(MGMT_DEPT, '-', LPAD(MGMT_NO, 3, '0')) MGNT_CODE, NAME, TAG_NAME_KOR, MODEL, MNFCT_CMPNY, MNFCT_SERIAL, STNDR, RCV_DT, USE_DT, CLSF_DOM_YN, CLSF_IMP_YN, CLSF_NEW_YN, CLSF_USD_YN, PRICE, LOC, FN_GET_IMAGE(PHOTO,0) PHOTO, PHOTO ATCH_FILE_ID, SPEC, MEAS_RANGE, MEMO, CEA_YN, CEB_YN, REA_YN, REB_YN, ESD_YN, RS_YN, EFT_YN, SURGE_YN, CS_YN, MFLD_YN, VDIP_YN, CLK_YN, DP_YN, FN_MEM_NAME(INS_MEM_ID) MEM_NAME FROM MACHINE_TB WHERE MACHINE_SEQ = #{machineSeq}

SELECT COUNT(1) FROM MACHINE_TB
WHERE 1=1
AND MGMT_DEPT IN #{sub}
AND DATE_FORMAT(REFORM_DT, '%Y%m%d') BETWEEN DATE_FORMAT(#{item.startDate}, '%Y%m%d') and DATE_FORMAT(#{item.endDate}, '%Y%m%d')
AND CAL_TGT = #{item.searchWord}
AND NAME LIKE CONCAT('%',#{item.searchWord},'%')
AND TAG_NAME_KOR LIKE CONCAT('%',#{item.searchWord},'%')
AND MODEL LIKE CONCAT('%',#{item.searchWord},'%')
AND CONCAT('SB-', LPAD(MACHINE_SEQ, 3, '0')) LIKE CONCAT('%',#{item.searchWord},'%')
AND CONCAT(MGMT_DEPT, '-', LPAD(MGMT_NO, 3, '0')) LIKE CONCAT('%',#{item.searchWord},'%')
AND CAL_NO LIKE CONCAT('%',#{item.searchWord},'%')

SET @rownum := 0; -- 순차 번호 초기화
SELECT MACHINE_SEQ, (@rownum := @rownum + 1) AS NO, -- 1부터 순차 번호 부여 CONCAT('SB-', LPAD(MACHINE_SEQ, 4, '0')) AS MACHINE_CODE, CONCAT(MGMT_DEPT, '-', LPAD(MGMT_NO, 3, '0')) AS MGNT_CODE, NAME, TAG_NAME_KOR, MODEL, MNFCT_CMPNY, MNFCT_SERIAL, CAL_NO, IFNULL (PHOTO, '-') PHOTO, LOC, FN_CODE_NAME(CAL_TGT, 'MT') CAL_TGT, FN_CODE_NAME(REFORM_PERIOD, 'MY') REFORM_PERIOD_NAME, IFNULL (DATE_FORMAT(CAL_DT, '%Y-%m-%d'), '-') CAL_DT, IFNULL (DATE_FORMAT(REFORM_DT, '%Y-%m-%d'), '-') REFORM_DT,
CASE WHEN CAL_FILE IS NOT NULL THEN CONCAT('/file/fileDown.do?atchFileId=', CAL_FILE, '&fileSn=0') ELSE '-' END AS CAL_FILE_LINK
FROM MACHINE_TB, (SELECT @rownum := 0) AS r
WHERE 1=1
AND MGMT_DEPT IN #{sub}
AND DATE_FORMAT(REFORM_DT, '%Y%m%d') BETWEEN DATE_FORMAT(#{item.startDate}, '%Y%m%d') and DATE_FORMAT(#{item.endDate}, '%Y%m%d')
AND CAL_TGT = #{item.searchWord}
AND NAME LIKE CONCAT('%',#{item.searchWord},'%')
AND TAG_NAME_KOR LIKE CONCAT('%',#{item.searchWord},'%')
AND MODEL LIKE CONCAT('%',#{item.searchWord},'%')
AND CONCAT('SB-', LPAD(MACHINE_SEQ, 3, '0')) LIKE CONCAT('%',#{item.searchWord},'%')
AND CONCAT(MGMT_DEPT, '-', LPAD(MGMT_NO, 3, '0')) LIKE CONCAT('%',#{item.searchWord},'%')
AND CAL_NO LIKE CONCAT('%',#{item.searchWord},'%')
ORDER BY MACHINE_SEQ DESC
LIMIT #{pageUnit} OFFSET #{firstIndex};

set @rownum:=0;
select lst.* from ( select @rownum:=@rownum+1 as NO, MACHINE_SEQ, CONCAT('SB-', LPAD(MACHINE_SEQ, 4, '0')) AS MACHINE_CODE, CONCAT(MGMT_DEPT, '-', LPAD(MGMT_NO, 3, '0')) AS MGMT_CODE, CEA_YN, CEB_YN, REA_YN, REB_YN, ESD_YN, RS_YN, EFT_YN, SURGE_YN, CS_YN, MFLD_YN, VDIP_YN, /* 9814 */ CLK_YN, DP_YN, NAME, IFNULL (TAG_NAME_KOR, '') TAG_NAME_KOR, MODEL, MNFCT_CMPNY, MNFCT_SERIAL, FN_CODE_NAME(CAL_TGT, 'MT') CAL_TGT, IFNULL (FN_CODE_NAME(REFORM_PERIOD, 'MY'), '0') REFORM_PERIOD, FN_CODE_NAME(REFORM_PERIOD, 'MY') REFORM_PERIOD_NAME,
ESD_YN useYn, ESD_ORDR disOrdr, RS_YN useYn, RS_ORDR disOrdr, EFT_YN useYn, EFT_ORDR disOrdr, SURGE_YN useYn, SURGE_ORDR disOrdr, CS_YN useYn, CS_ORDR disOrdr, MFLD_YN useYn, MFLD_ORDR disOrdr, VDIP_YN useYn, VDIP_ORDR disOrdr, CEA_YN useYn, CEA_ORDR disOrdr, CEB_YN useYn, CEB_ORDR disOrdr, REA_YN useYn, REA_ORDR disOrdr, REB_YN useYn, REB_ORDR disOrdr,
CLK_YN useYn, CLK_ORDR disOrdr, DP_YN useYn, DP_ORDR disOrdr,
IFNULL (DATE_FORMAT(CAL_DT, '%Y-%m-%d'), '-') CAL_DT, IFNULL (DATE_FORMAT(REFORM_DT, '%Y-%m-%d'), '-') REFORM__DT_STR, IFNULL (DATE_FORMAT(REFORM_DT, '%Y-%m-%d'), '-') REFORM_DT
FROM MACHINE_TB WHERE 1=1 AND MGMT_DEPT IN ('ES','EI') AND STATE != 'D'
and ESD_YN = 1 and RS_YN = 1 and EFT_YN = 1 and SURGE_YN = 1 and CS_YN = 1 and MFLD_YN = 1 and VDIP_YN = 1 and CEA_YN = 1 and CEB_YN = 1 and REA_YN = 1 and REB_YN = 1 and CLK_YN = 1 and DP_YN = 1
ORDER BY
ESD_ORDR ASC, RS_ORDR ASC, EFT_ORDR ASC, SURGE_ORDR ASC, CS_ORDR ASC, MFLD_ORDR ASC, VDIP_ORDR ASC, CEA_ORDR ASC, CEB_ORDR ASC, REA_ORDR ASC, REB_ORDR ASC,
CLK_ORDR ASC, DP_ORDR ASC,
MACHINE_SEQ DESC
) lst ORDER BY NO ASC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MACHINE_TB ( MACHINE_SEQ, MGMT_DEPT, MGMT_NO, NAME, TAG_NAME_KOR, MODEL, MNFCT_CMPNY, MNFCT_SERIAL, STNDR, RCV_DT, USE_DT, CLSF_DOM_YN, CLSF_IMP_YN, CLSF_NEW_YN, CLSF_USD_YN, PRICE, LOC, PHOTO, SPEC, MEAS_RANGE, MEMO, CEA_YN, CEB_YN, REA_YN, REB_YN, ESD_YN, RS_YN, EFT_YN, SURGE_YN, CS_YN, MFLD_YN, VDIP_YN, CLK_YN, DP_YN, INS_MEM_ID, INS_DT, UDT_MEM_ID, UDT_DT, STATE ) VALUES ( #{machineSeq}, #{mgmtDept}, #{mgmtNo}, #{name}, #{tagNameKor}, #{model}, #{mnfctCmpny}, #{mnfctSerial}, #{stndr}, NULLIF(#{rcvDt}, ''), NULLIF(#{useDt}, ''), #{clsfDomYn}, #{clsfImpYn}, #{clsfNewYn}, #{clsfUsdYn}, #{price}, #{loc}, #{photo}, #{spec}, #{measRange}, #{memo}, #{ceaYn}, #{cebYn}, #{reaYn}, #{rebYn}, #{esdYn}, #{rsYn}, #{eftYn}, #{surgeYn}, #{csYn}, #{mfldYn}, #{vdipYn}, #{clkYn}, #{dpYn}, #{insMemId}, NOW(), #{udtMemId}, NOW(), 'I' ) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE NAME = VALUES(NAME), TAG_NAME_KOR = VALUES(TAG_NAME_KOR), MODEL = VALUES(MODEL), MNFCT_CMPNY = VALUES(MNFCT_CMPNY), MNFCT_SERIAL = VALUES(MNFCT_SERIAL), STNDR = VALUES(STNDR), RCV_DT = VALUES(RCV_DT), USE_DT = VALUES(USE_DT), CLSF_DOM_YN = VALUES(CLSF_DOM_YN), CLSF_IMP_YN = VALUES(CLSF_IMP_YN), CLSF_NEW_YN = VALUES(CLSF_NEW_YN), CLSF_USD_YN = VALUES(CLSF_USD_YN), PRICE = VALUES(PRICE), LOC = VALUES(LOC), PHOTO = VALUES(PHOTO), SPEC = VALUES(SPEC), MEAS_RANGE = VALUES(MEAS_RANGE), MEMO = VALUES(MEMO), CEA_YN = VALUES(CEA_YN), CEB_YN = VALUES(CEB_YN), REA_YN = VALUES(REA_YN), REB_YN = VALUES(REB_YN), ESD_YN = VALUES(ESD_YN), RS_YN = VALUES(RS_YN), EFT_YN = VALUES(EFT_YN), SURGE_YN = VALUES(SURGE_YN), CS_YN = VALUES(CS_YN), MFLD_YN = VALUES(MFLD_YN), VDIP_YN = VALUES(VDIP_YN), CLK_YN = VALUES(CLK_YN), DP_YN = VALUES(DP_YN), UDT_MEM_ID = VALUES(UDT_MEM_ID), UDT_DT = NOW(), STATE = 'U';
mapper.update: UPDATE MACHINE_TB AS MT JOIN MACHINE_CAL_INFO AS MC ON MT.MACHINE_SEQ = MC.MACHINE_SEQ SET MT.CAL_TGT = MC.CAL_TGT, MT.CAL_DT = MC.CAL_DT, MT.CAL_ORG = MC.CAL_ORG, MT.CAL_NO = MC.CAL_NO, MT.CAL_FILE = MC.CAL_FILE, MT.REFORM_DT = MC.REFORM_DT, MT.REFORM_PERIOD = MC.REFORM_PERIOD, MT.UDT_MEM_ID = MC.UDT_MEM_ID, MT.UDT_DT = NOW() WHERE MC.MACHINE_CAL_SEQ = #{machineCalSeq};
